title: Fundamental JavaScript Programming Exercises
description: In this lab, we will be exploring JavaScript programming by completing a series of exercises designed to help build fundamental skills. From basic syntax and data types to more advanced concepts like asynchronous programming and functional programming, this lab will provide hands-on experience that will help you become a proficient JavaScript developer. Whether you're new to programming or looking to expand your skills, this lab will give you the tools you need to succeed.

meta.title: JavaScript Programming Fundamentals | Hands-On Lab
meta.description: Explore JavaScript programming with a series of exercises designed to build fundamental skills, from basic syntax to advanced concepts like asynchronous programming.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Programming, Fundamentals, Hands-On, Algorithm, Exercises

verify.name: Verify Node Command Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: JavaScript 基础编程练习
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将通过完成一系列旨在帮助培养基本技能的练习来探索 JavaScript 编程。从基本语法和数据类型到异步编程和函数式编程等更高级的概念，本实验将提供实践经验，帮助你成为一名熟练的 JavaScript 开发者。无论你是编程新手还是希望扩展技能，本实验都将为你提供成功所需的工具。

meta.title: JavaScript 编程基础 | 实践实验
meta.description: 通过一系列旨在培养基本技能的练习来探索 JavaScript 编程，从基本语法到异步编程等高级概念。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, 编程, 基础, 实践, 算法, 练习

verify.name: 验证 Node 命令用法
verify.hint: 在终端/SSH 中输入 'node' 并回车即可运行 JavaScript。
